ygData.subject: Blood Sabres
ygData.msgSnippet: I m looking for methods in general to raise faction with the Blood Sabres, the guild in the Qeynos Aqueducts. Specifically, I would like to know if there is
ygData.messageBody:
I'm looking for methods in general to raise faction with the Blood
Sabres, the guild in the Qeynos Aqueducts. Specifically, I would like
to know if there is something to do with the "Busted Prayer Beads"
that Brother Estle drops. I suspect I need Whole Beads to do the
other quest, but I am wondering if I can do something with them to
raise Blood Sabre faction.


Thanks in advance for any insight you are able to provide me/us.
